page.title: 18Three Annual Events
page.content:
{December:}Every year at Christmas a parent's committee organise a Christmas party for all the children under 12 living in the area (about 80). There are the usual games and Santa comes and gives every child a present. The party costs about Â£300.
{June:}Every year in June a committee of parents and teachers organise a joint sports for the children of Glenzier and Canonbie schools. They raise funds towards the buying of trophies and shields and refreshments for the children.
{August:}Every year the horticultural society organise a flower show in the village hall, with games, sports and sideshows on the park beside the hall. There are classes for flowers, veg, baking, sticks, and many other things.
